titles.title: National Guard and Ready Reserves Employment Protection Act of 2006
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a credit against income tax for employing members of the Ready Reserve or National Guard.
National Guard and Ready Reserves Employment Protection Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: National Guard and Ready Reserves Employment Protection Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a tax credit for 15% of the first $10,000 of wages paid to an employee who is a member of the National Guard or Ready Reserve. Terminates such credit after 2011.
